price: Enti (Nkͻmhyεni), wodeε si aboterε fama wo Wura Nyankopͻn atemmuo no, na nokorε sε wo wͻ Y’ani so (anaasε Yehu wo anaa Yεbͻ woho ban); na bͻ wo Wura Nyankopͻn abodin wͻ εberε a wobεsͻre (afri nna mu),
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika fa-innaka bi-aʿyuninā wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika ḥīna taqūmu
